ComicInfo.Title: I'm On A Boat
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE X-MEN SAIL AT DAWN!
Even in this glorious new dawn, Mutantkind faces hardships and oppression from their human counterparts. Led by Captain Kate Pryde and funded by Emma Frost and the Hellfire Trading Company, Marauders Storm, Pyro, Bishop and Iceman sail the seas of the world to protect those hated and feared!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Russell Dauterman & Matthew Wilson | 1 | Var | Every Mutant Ever Variant Cover | Mark Bagley, John Dell & Israel SIlva | 2-3 | Var | Young Guns Variant Cover | Aaron Kuder & Jordie Bellaire | 4 | Var | Design Variant Cover | Tom Muller | 5 | Var | Variant Cover | Philip Tan & Jay David Ramos | 6 | Var | Hidden Gem Variant Cover | Rick Leonardi & Richard Isanove | 7 | Var | Variant Cover | Todd Nauck & Rachelle Rosenberg | 8 | Var | Red Queen Variant Cover | Russell Dauterman & Federico Blee | 9 |
